name: Gib zur Bayer. Grenz-Spende LCCN2004665996 - from Commons

desc.html: English:  Title: Gib zur Bayer. Grenz-Spende Abstract: Poster shows a man walking away from a gaming table and depositing money into a bucket marked "Grenze-Spende" which is held by a cherub; in background, two men sit playing cards. Text encourages people to give to the Bavarian Border Fund to keep Upper Silesia part of Germany. Establishments accepting donations are listed on bottom of poster. Physical description: 1 print (poster) : lithograph, color ; 70 x 48 cm. Notes: Forms part of: Rehse-Archiv für Zeitgeschichte und Publizistik.; W. Krain.; Title from item.
